spec_data.Name: rubygem-mono_logger
spec_data.Description:
A lock-free logger compatible with Ruby 2.0. Ruby does not allow you to
request a lock in a trap handler because that could deadlock, so Logger is not
sufficient.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Wed 22 Feb 2017 05:54:43 AM EST, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: A lock-free logger compatible with Ruby 2.0
